org.dbasu.robomvvm.componentadapter.edittext

Class TextChangeEventArg

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.dbasu.robomvvm.componentmodel.EventArg
      • org.dbasu.robomvvm.componentmodel.PropertyChangeEventArg
        • org.dbasu.robomvvm.componentadapter.edittext.TextChangeEventArg

  • public class TextChangeEventArg
extends PropertyChangeEventArg
    Raised by the EditTextViewAdapter when its text property changes.

        Construct a TextChangeEventArg.
        Parameters:
        sender - The edit text view adapter that raises this event.
        charSequence - The char sequence that changed.
        startLocation - The start location of the change.
        oldCount - The old count of characters beginning from the start location.
        newCount - The new count of characters beginning from the start location.
